Job Title: Senior Software Developer- Permanent WFH- UK based MNC
Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities UK based 30 years old MNC having presence in countries like UK, Australia, New Zealand, Singapore, India, US etc need Senior Software Engineer.Candidates should have experience of 3-4 years in below mentioned skillsets.MandatoryASP.NET MVC using C#.NET Client-side JavaScript / JQuery React Js Web API (ASP.NET Core) HTML, CSS, Saas Valid PassportHighly DesirableEntity Framework Core SQL ServerUnit testing framework (XUnit/NUnit/ MSTest/ JUnit)Windows Services Candidates who can attend virtual interview on 13 Mar 2021 can only apply.
